basics.name: Jon Crabtree
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Graded for Intro to Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms, and Engineering Electromagnetics
highlights: Assessed and provided constructive feedback on assignments
Present and responsive to student emails regarding class material and logistics
Guideda and instructed students in courses up to multivariable calculus, programming, general chemistry, and physics.
Troubleshooted technology problems for students, and accomodated students with various needs such as ESL or disabilities such as blindness.

volunteer.organization: Vertically Integrated Project for Sustainability at UH Manoa
volunteer.summary: Developer and Team Member for Gas Meter and Electric Vehicle projects
highlights: Helped design a gas meter sensor using computer vision and a Raspberry Pi
Conducted research to inform project regarding infrastructural policy surrounding campus EV Charging.
